## Background
<p>This is an interactive <a href="https://shiny.rstudio.com/", target="_blank">Shiny R</a> App for exploring relationships among sample size, mean, variance, and effect size for two normal distributions. Effect is calclulated using <a href="https://en.wikiversity.org/wiki/Cohen%27s_d" target = "_blank">Cohen's d</a>.
